description: Detects the execution of REGSVR32.exe with DLL files masquerading as other files
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
frack113
name: Regsvr32 DLL Execution With Suspicious File Extension
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\regsvr32.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"REGSVR32.EXE")) AND process.command_line.text:("*.bin" OR "*.bmp" OR "*.cr2" OR "*.dat" OR "*.eps" OR "*.gif" OR "*.ico" OR "*.jpeg" OR "*.jpg" OR "*.nef" OR "*.orf" OR "*.png" OR "*.raw" OR "*.sr2" OR "*.temp" OR "*.tif" OR "*.tiff" OR "*.tmp" OR "*.rtf" OR "*.txt"))
